Red Accent

The Red Accent project... A collaboration with the Belgian wingsuiter Sven Ugau.

Sven Ugau is a famous name in the world of wingsuit BASE jumping. His speciallity is the target hitting during the flight. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
